description: Sunuva is a children's swimwear and UV protective clothing e-commerce site. The Smashing Magazine case study (2021) identified navigation complexity, header clutter, and checkout friction as key conversion barriers. Benchmark tasks focus on the purchase funnel.
tasks: Find and add a UV protective swimsuit for a 5-year-old boy to your shopping cart.
Complete the checkout process to purchase an item in your cart, entering shipping and payment details.
